name: devchuckcamp/mod-three-fsm
description: A type-safe Finite State Automaton (FSA) generator library for PHP 8.3+. Build custom deterministic finite automata using formal 5-tuple definitions (Q, Σ, q₀, δ, F). Features comprehensive validation, clean API design, and extensible architecture. Includes modulo-three implementation and practical examples (parity checking, divisibility testing, pattern validation, protocol state machines).
